name: retrace
description: Highlight and navigate between your most recently edited chunks of code

retrace.highlightColor.description: The color of the highlighted trail (in rgb format). I'd recommend keeping this subtle - black (`rgb(0, 0, 0)`) if you have a dark theme and white (`rgb(255, 255, 255)`) if you have a light theme.

retrace.highlightColorMaxOpacity.description: The maximum opacity for highlighting recently changed lines (0 - 1)

retrace.highlightColorFocusedOpacity.description: The opacity for highlighting currently focused chunks (0 - 1). Used when doHighlightCurrentlyFocusedChunk is true.

retrace.doHighlightChanges.description: Turn on to highlight changed lines (historical changes will still be saved, for navigation)

retrace.doHighlightCurrentlyFocusedChunk.description: When enabled, the currently focused chunk will be highlighted with reduced opacity (defined by highlightColorFocusedOpacity). When disabled, the currently focused chunk won't be highlighted at all.

retrace.doHighlightEmptyLines.description: Turn on to highlight empty lines.

retrace.doHighlightOnClick.description: Turn on to add highlights when you click on a line.

retrace.doHighlightInactiveEditors.description: Turn on to show highlights in inactive editors (e.g. when you have multiple files open).

retrace.maxNumberOfChangesToHighlight.description: The number of changes to highlight with the background color.

retrace.maxNumberOfChangesToRemember.description: The number of changes to save in history for using your keybindings to navigate between.

retrace.minDistanceFromCursorToHighlight.description: The minimum distance from the cursor to highlight a line.

retrace.clearChangesOnFileSave.description: Turn on to clear all changes within a file when you save it.

scripts.pretest: yarn run test-compile && yarn run lint
